data.name: Phantom Thief Mew's Secret Prima
data.detailed_description:
About the game
---------------------------------------------------------------

“Phantom Thief Mew's Secret Prima” is a action adventure game that has catgirl phantom thief for those who wants some cute elements in game.

~Story~
The main character, Miu is a normal, kind-hearted girl whose parents are both phantom thieves.

Miu adores to be a city girl and forcibly trying to get into school in the city. However, her parents want Miu to come back to home.
For Miu to continue living alone, she has to accept the condition given by her parent.

The condition was "Miu has to prove herself as a phantom thief".

In order to protect her life as a city girl, she starts to accept requests from people with unusual reasons and works as a phantom thief
with the help of her unusual childhood friend, Chinatsu.
data.about_the_game:
About the game
---------------------------------------------------------------

~Story~
The main character, Miu is a normal, kind-hearted girl whose parents are both phantom thieves.

Miu adores to be a city girl and forcibly trying to get into school in the city. However, her parents want Miu to come back to home.
For Miu to continue living alone, she has to accept the condition given by her parent.

The condition was "Miu has to prove herself as a phantom thief".

data.short_description: In an unexpected turn of events, Miu becomes a phantom thief. As a phantom thief, you have to carry out various mission along with her childhood friend, Chinatsu. To complete your mission,you have to sneak into the targetted location and dodge the obstacles in the way to proceed.
data.supported_languages:
Japanese*, English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 3GHz以上
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 10
